post:
Hey guys, pleased to announce we got our IP space and servers in the UK now, we're able to offer very attractive plans:

<pre>
UK -
4 Cores
2048MB Ram
20GB Disk (SAS)
1TB BW
1 IPv4 / 10 IPv6
100Mbit port (shared gbit)
$6.95 - No discount on this sorry :-(

</pre>

UK: [Order
](https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=32
)
Ger -
<pre>
4 Cores
1024MB DEDICATED RAM
60GB DEDICATED DISK
750GB PREMIUM BW
MULTIPLE LINUX OS'S
1 IPV4 / 10 IPV6
Availability: Phoenix / Germany
Before discount: $6.95 - After: $3.50
Coupon: SSAVINGSVZ
2x1GBit Port
</pre>

Germany: [Order](https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)
Germany is now in our new facility at GlobalSwitch, each server has 2x1GBit bonded :-)

Looking for another location that we haven't listed? What about KVM?  Be sure to bookmark [VPSStock.com](http://VPSstock.com)!

Be sure to follow us on twitter (@NodeDeploy) and to check our [StatusPage](http://status.nodedeploy.com)

UK: Hermes.nodedeploy.com / [TestFile](http://Hermes.nodedeploy.com/100mb.test)
